contacts.name: Regin
contacts.signature: Do not contact for non-research funding matters

111400000.text: The location it's displaying this time is kinda weird. I've never been there. Is everything okay?

111400001.text: There are so many things here. I took so long to find it and got so much dust on my clothes. You gotta give me some dry cleaning funds

111400002.text: With me running the show, of course everything is okay! It was just such a hassle. I feel I need to charge you more...

111400003.text: Don't you go raising the price on the spot! I don't have a lot of research funds either! Tell me, where's the anomaly this time?

111400004.text: It was in a large wardrobe. Not very innovative when it comes to hide-and-seek

111400005.text: In the end of uttermost darkness... Where not a single shred of light shines in!

111400006.text: Oh... In a wardrobe, huh. Yeah, that's not very creative

111400007.text: Come back soon! Maybe the sensor is close to detecting something again! You'll need to head out quickly in that case!
